title: CNBC Daily Open: Markets’ ‘lack of conviction’
description: Markets lacked conviction, while the debate over the U.S. debt ceiling remained roiled by passionate intensity.

title: No, you can’t ride a lion on safari — why more companies are telling travelers ‘no’ these days
description: Social media, sustainability measures and staffing shortages are among the reasons travel companies are having to deny travelers' requests these days.

title: China's recovery lifts U.S. companies' sales as domestic consumers pull back spending
description: Many U.S. companies said China's recovery helped their quarterly sales, but demand hasn't snapped back as quickly as expected for some.

title: Turks vote in crunch election as President Erdogan faces greatest threat to his 20-year rule
description: For the presidency — which is expected to be close — if no candidate wins more than 50%, the vote goes to a run-off two weeks later.
